lore: The Stone Devil usually roams around the periphery of the woods, looking for innocent campers who just want to relax in nature. It will appear to be a good-natured satyr and tell anyone it finds that it knows of a beautiful place near the forest entrance where they could go spend the afternoon. Once it guides them there, it will wait until they make a "mistake". A broken branch, a flower stepped on by accident. Any excuse will do to bludgeon them to death with its heavy mace.
menagerieDialog: You're the big boss here, right? You should share some of them resources with me, neh?
I prefer blades over magic. What's the fun in casting a spell when there's no blood to show in the aftermath of your effort?
The devil's in the details, neh?\n\n(Well, that was random.)
I have an idea! You should raise your kingdom's taxes. That way, you can steal from everyone with impunity.
I absolutely, positively did not steal this bag of coins from anyone.
name: Stone Devil
